RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 10500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BANNED FROM MIDWAY raced mid pack early, had a quick move on the turn and reached contention, closed determinedly and drew clear late. SOULSTONE was away alertly and quickly made the lead, , was hooked in mid stretch by the winner, could not match strides late but was second best. STRAIGHT TO GO chased the speed on the inside and went evenly. SAUNTER tracked three wide and was no threat. PACKIN raced mid pack early and had no rally. NOGRATZ contended early three wide and was through after a half. THEYCALLMELEE was off slowly, showed little and trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 60. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 5 All owed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEMON MOUSSE pressed the early pace, rallied on the far turn, edged clear late under left handed urging. BETTER HALF was away alertly and quickly made the lead,, was hooked at the quarter pole, held grudgingly and was second best. EXPRESS FASHION had good position, on the inside and went evenly late. LATE DATE was unhurried early and trailed, rallied in the stretch and closed a gap. REYS PINA COLADA allowed to settle, failed to menace. STARLITESLEW contented early and tired on the far turn. BEAUTIFUL LASS tracked three wide and faded in the stretch. GIMME CLEARANCE contended early and was through after a half.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIMESATAPPIN was unhurried early and trailed, rallied on the inside, altered course ijn mid stretch three wide, closed determinedly and was up in the last jump. CONNECT ME raced mid pack early, rallied at the quarter pole, dueled in the stretch and just missed. C C'S CLEAR CREEK set the pace and was well handled on the front end, held grudgingly in the stretch and weakened late. NAPA DUDE raced mid pack and and no rally. SCREAMING JEREMY pressed the pace for three quarters, then gave way in the stretch. BUDDHA BOY vied for the lead until the quarter pole, then dropped back. ONE FOR THE MONEY was no factor early and was eased to the wire. WAITES KINGDOM pressed the pace, took a bad step at the half mile pole, was pulled up and was euthanize. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CURIOSITY KILLS chased, the early speed, rallied at the quarter pole and gained the lead, remained clear late while being ridden out. LUCKY CAT TOO raced mid pack early, rallied in the stretch on the inside and was second best. SPEEDY FIRE had good position early, angled out three wide in the stretch and went evenly late. FIONA tracked four wide and was no threat late. LELAWALA allowed to settle, failed to menace. SCARRAZANO was no factor. GREGS POSSE had good early speed for a half, then gave way.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNCAPTURED FAITH vied for the early lead, dropped back slightly on the far turn, came again in the stretch on the rail and drew clear late under strong handling. SHRIMPIE had good position early, rallied at the quarter pole, drew even in mid stretch and was outfinished late. UNESCORTED dueled on the early lead, gained a clear lead down the backside, was hooked in mid stretch and weakened slightly. MISS MATCHMAKER never far back while racing four wide, went evenly late. ENDLESS allowed to settle, failed to menace. GRAN CHEMIN raced mi pack and had no rally. SOPHISTICATED raced close up for three quarters, then gave way. PLAYFUL SUMMER was outrun. FRIEND settled early, dropped back at the quarter pole, was eased in the stretch and was vanned off.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 5 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DROP ANCHOR sprinted out and quickly made the lead, led throughout and dug in gamely late and prevailed. KILLER BEE was never far back, rallied on the inside, drew close in mid stretch and just missed. ON SPOT chased the speed for three quarters and weakened in the stretch. FISHING FOR FUN had good position early, lacked a late kick and went evenly. ALFIO raced mid pack and went evenly. FATHER PATRICK was unhurried early, and was no threat. ONE LUCKY DAY was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 5 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYSTIQUE SABOTEUR dueled on the lead throughout, drew clear late, driving. SALLY STRONG pressed the pace on the inside, was in tight on the far turn, continued on willingly and was second best. WINDY LU WHO was never far back, rallied in the stretch three wide and finished willingly. MAUREENLOVESFRANK tracked the pace three wide and tired in the stretch. PERFECTINGTHEVIEW had good position for three quarters, then gave way. BLAZING ZENNA was no threat. BLONDE BY NATURE was allowed to settle early, angled out on the turn and was no threat. LIEUTENANT KITTY trailed. The rider of SALLY STRONG claimed foul against the rider of MYSTIQUE SABOTEUR for alleged on the far turn. After viewing the tape the stewards took no action.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHTMAKESSENSE tracked three wide, had a quick move at the three eight pole and gained the lead, drew off late under firm handling. CANDYMONIUM dueled on the early lead, was no match late for winner, but was second best. LORDHEARMYPRAYER stumbled soon after the start and trailed, rallied in the stretch and improved. TWELVE SHARP was never far back, saved ground, and went evenly late. MISS BRIGHTSIDE was allowed to settle, angled out down the backside and was no menace. SAIDAR was no factor. TATHBEET allowed to settle, failed to menace. DONNARUMMA contended for three quarters, then gave way. KISS IT GOODBYE pressed the pace and was through after a half. I'VE BEEN THINKIN dueled for a half, then stopped.
